ygData.subject: Re: Verant ruined the revive line of spells
ygData.msgSnippet: o i agree...it totally SUX........not only do they lower the dmg our best dd does by at least 50 points...
ygData.messageBody:
o i agree...it totally SUX........not only do they lower the dmg our best dd does by at least
50 points...<those 50 points make a difference...i was able to solo a greater kobold in sol b
using 3 rets and maybe one stun...now it takes at least 3 rets and 2 stuns of 85 points> but
then they dump this freakin rez aura.....and don't get me started on the no cleric only
weapons......that and the fact that we can't wear all mithril like warriors or pallies....only
thing we can wear is the bp and the bracers...no sleeves, no greeves.....what gives? it's all
plate claases EXCEPT for clerics

(\/)ystix Spellchaser
lv 45 venting human cleric of The Rathe

Olli Haapam∩┐╜ki wrote:

> From: Olli Haapam∩┐╜ki <olli.haapamaki@...>
>
> I just did a revive on myself yesterday and was damn surprised to the result. Usually
> all it does is teleport to corpse and return a little xp. But at that time it did a whole
> lot more. And all of them were negative side effects. After resurrection i had all my
> mana drained, had only 50% of HP, had some kind of weakness effect on me and
> all this without any addition to the positive effects (xp gain). I feel this is a terribly
> wrong move by Verant. And besides they did not mention a thing about it in the
> patch message. Why the heck did they do something like this? Do they want to
> ruin the cleric now that it is perfectly balanced? That would be awfully stupid.
>
> Iyenya Goldenheart
> Lvl 30 dwarf cleric
> Innoruuk server
>
